tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm delighted to share my positive experience with Dr. Pallabi Ghosh Saha, who recently performed a root canal treatment on my teeth. Dr. Pallabi's workmanship is truly commendable, showcasing a high level of skill and precision. What sets her apart is not just her expertise but also her genuine care and concern for her patients. Throughout the procedure, she demonstrated a comforting and attentive approach, making the entire experience much more bearable. I highly recommend Dr. Pallabi for her excellent dental work and compassionate manner.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She does her job perfectly and takes care of all aspects of teething problems. She also maintains appointed time right there otherwise which is often irritating to wait. This is 3 or 4 times that I visited here for teething problems.
Thank you

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Madam Doctor always will guide me while carrying out her activities against Route canal treatment if any inconvenience feeling or not . If find difficulties then she is taking care with his assistant . Both are very co-operative at the time of work. Actually this treatment is very delicate work like inside mouth vital things and all sensetive nerves are associated with our teeth . So with very carefully it should be done. But question is its durability how long it could protect me. That Doctor will decide and give us suitable advice as they are in depth about this subject.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor had taken enough precaution so that I never experience any pain. Dr. was also friendly and was always talking to me to relieve my nervousness during the RCT as this was my first time experience.  Dr. also explained me the oral hygiene and show me the work that is going on my yeeth directly with mirror once. This gives confidence in patient. Also the next restrictions and medications are explained very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The things I liked about doctor is that she was friendly and  with great communication  skills. Truly professional and I felt at home under her. She explained the problems in my teeth and I am completely satisfied by her treatment. Their response is superb and also I thank all the staffs. The facility in theism is excellent and state of the art. I recommend Theism for  any dental consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Pallabi and her husband Dr Saha are two of the most friendly and pleasant dentists one can imagine. I had apprehension regarding RCT, but they guided me very well and i have undergone 2 successful RCTs under the amazing fingers of Dr. Pallabi. 
I recommend all my friends and family members to visit them for any oral problem.

She is very confident professional n caring  to her patients.
